pull.title: MainNet is the special case for the GUI

events.message: MainNet is the special case for the GUI

issue.title: Improvements in CChainParams
issue.body:
Replace direct references to RegTest() with constant parameters on CChainParams interface.
EDIT: dependency merged

events.body:
Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/89ec3a29111075ff1eb8309d6a43662c492c30af for binaries and test log.
This test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/current/
Contact BlueMatt on freenode if something looks broken.

ACK, it makes sense to base the choice on the network ID directly.
This also means that future added chains will be shown as testnet, which is much more likely than a new mainnet.
